alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 4:08AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...BRIEF PERIOD OF MODERATE SNOW TO REDUCE VISIBILITY INTO CENTRAL AND EASTERN MASSACHUSETTS... At 406 AM EST, abrief moderate intensity snow was located along a line extending from near Lowell to near Worcester. Movement was east at 45 mph. Visibilities as low as one half mile, gusts up to 40 mph and up to a half inch of new snow can be expected as this snow band moves east-southeast. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Lowell, Lawrence, Framingham, Haverhill, Waltham, Chicopee, Peabody, Methuen, Leominster, Fitchburg, Billerica, Holyoke, Marlborough, Woburn, Amherst, Shrewsbury, Chelmsford, Andover and Natick. The snow can accumulate at a rate of one inch per hour or more in this band of heavy snow. Be prepared for hazardous driving conditions. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through this band of heavy snow.
